artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates. Plain weave or Twill variation. Similar to Pomegranate. Med blue, drk teal, olive warp. Royal blue, drk teal, drk green weft. Left selvedge.
